title: Law & Religion on the Barrett Court
description: It's a deep dive into law and religion in this conservative supermajority iteration of the Supreme Court. Kate talks with Micah Schwartzman of UVA and Nelson Tebbe of Cornell about some of the major religious liberty cases that have come before the Court in recent years, and what the Court may be signaling for the future.
author: hey@crooked.com (kate shaw, micah schwartzman, nelson tebbe)
content:encoded: It's a deep dive into law and religion in this conservative supermajority iteration of the Supreme Court.
